transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, hi sir, Namaste. Ravi sir se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Bolie.
Executive: Sir, main Raju Maurya baat kar raha hun IndiaMART team se, aapka account manager.
Customer: Bolie.
Executive: Sir, ye sahi time hai aapse baat karne ke liye?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir, maine just iske regarding call kiya hai ki ye jo aap main dekh pa raha hun ki kai saari calls aapke miss ho rahi hai sir.
Customer: Jo buyer call kar rahe hai aapko.
Customer: Sare nahi utha rahe.
Executive: Nahi, sare miss nahi ho rahe.
Customer: [unintelligible] ho raha hai to pata nahi.
Customer: Hum to sare call uthate hai. Jo jo ka jiska bhi phone aaya humne nahi uthaya aisa nahi bana. Sabke call uthata hai.
Executive: To sir yaha pe hamare system me show kar raha hai, paanch calls miss hui hai sir ab tak November ke month me.
Customer: Nahi, aisa nahi ho sakta.
Executive: To dusri baar bhi unse baat ho gayi hogi ya to phir humne samne se call karke liya hoga. Miss nahi hui hai koi is mahine me, wo to itna to pata hai.
Customer: Wo log pata hai wo log call karke seedha kaat dete hai to kaise pata chalega phir wo to waise bhi [inaudible].
Executive: Aap matlab dekhiye turant paanch calls aayi thi jisme se jisme se chaar calls se aapki baat hui hai November ke month me aur ek ek call miss hui hai to aisa to nahi hai ki na ki jaise client jaise buyer ne call kiya hoga to phir aapne call back karke usse baat ki hogi same number pe, aisa hua hai kya?
Customer: Nahi nahi aisa nahi hota. Buyer ne kaat diya hoga seedha phone karke.
Executive: Achha achha. Wo bhi miss call gina jayega na wo bhi.
Executive: To matlab aapne sare call ko reply kiya hai, sahi?
Customer: Haan kiya hai, kiya hai.
Executive: Thik hai. Aur sir ye jo aapki company ki rating main yaha pe dekh pa raha hun, ye 3.6 show kar raha hai, kaafi kam rating hai company ki sir. Iska reason jaan sakta hun? Aisa kyun hai?
Customer: Wo to mujhe kya pata? Wo jo rating kiya hai usne to hamare paas kuch purchase bhi nahi kiya aur waise bhi rating kar diya hai isne.
Executive: Ji ji. To sir aap jo hai ki buyer se jaise jo buyer se calls inquiries karte hai to unko rating ke liye link share karte hai aap unko?
Customer: Haan main bolta hun lekin kuch log karte hai nahi karte hai aisa karte hai. Main sabko bolta hun.
Executive: To sir link wagera kaha share karna hai aap aap aapko pata hai malum hai uske bare me link kaha se share karna hota hai?
Customer: Wo to niche sare link aati hai usme se koi share karna rahega.
Executive: Haan matlab isse pehle aapne link share kiya hai kisi buyer ko?
Customer: Nahi kisi ko share nahi kiya maine, link share nahi kiya.
Executive: To ek baar main guide kar du aapko video meeting pe?
Customer: Nahi nahi wo to guide karne ka jarurat nahi hai. Wo to main dekh lunga apne aap. Nahi malum padega to main puch lunga call karke.
Executive: Haan sir wo thik hai lekin hamare jo bhi jo seniors hai na to unko hame report karna hota hai. To ye saari cheez sir compulsory hoti hai to ek baar main video meeting ka link share kar raha hun.
Customer: Nahi nahi itna free nahi hun main video meeting ke liye.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: [unintelligible] thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai ek baar aise hi main bata deta hun aapko. Phone se use karte hai ya laptop se use karte hai sir aap IndiaMART?
Customer: Phone se, phone se, phone se.
Executive: Phone me sir ek baar login kijiye IndiaMART ka jo hai ye sir system isme login kijiye.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Do minute me main aa gaya. Samajh gaya. Bolie abhi bolie kya bolna hai. Application open kijiye.
Executive: Specifically usme sir lead manager ka option aa raha hoga.
Customer: Aa lead manager ka option aa gaya.
Executive: Haan lead manager me dekhiye pehla client jaise pehla jo aapka buyer hai wo Ashok Kumar ji hai, dekh pa rahe hai?
Customer: Kaha pe?
Customer: Jo lead manager aapne click kiya hoga to all contacts me Ashok Kumar dikha raha hoga. Pehla.
Customer: Location category fresh unread aisa dikha raha hai. More me jana hai mujhe?
Executive: Haan lead manager me jab aapne click kiya lead manager.
Customer: Haan wo click kiya maine.
Executive: Haan to all contacts me aapko pehla jo aapne buyer ko jo reminder aapne set kiya hua hai 6:30 baje ka 6 tarikh ke liye aaj hi ke liye aapne set kiya hua hai Ashok Kumar ji hai ye.

Customer: Ashok Kumar hai buyer hai ye.
Customer: Ab wo aage ask for review hai na?
Executive: Haan ask for review ji ji wahi. Wahi pe click karenge na to
Customer: Ji. Ek baar sir aise hi aap haan aise hi sir aap sare buyers se jin jin se aapki baat chit hogi inquiries hoga to aap unko send kar dijiyega sir, thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai, thik hai, thik hai.
Executive: Haan isse sir kya hoga na ki aapki company ki rating review achha rahega to business badhne me kaafi sahi rahegi sir aap.
Customer: Okay okay thik hai.
Executive: Aur sir ek aur cheez kehna chahta hun sir, hello.
Customer: Hello, hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states they answer all buylead calls.

- Executive says 5 calls missed in November.

- Customer's company rating is low (3.6).



Resolution:

- Executive explains how to share rating link.

- Executive guides customer on sharing rating link.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send rating links to buyers.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, rating, review, link sharing
